# zendesk_locales (Data Source)

Provides a data source to query available locales.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zendesk_locales" "all" {
}

output "available_locales" {
  value = data.zendesk_locales.all.locales
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `locales` (List of Object) List of available locales. Each locale object contains:
  - `created_at` (String) The time the locale was created.
  - `id` (Number) The ID of the locale.
  - `locale` (String) The locale code.
  - `name` (String) The name of the locale.
  - `updated_at` (String) The time the locale was last updated.
  - `url` (String) The API url of the locale.
